categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Agent Flodon was a male Human who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War as a member of the Destabilization branch of Imperial Intelligence. After being surgically-altered to give him the appearance of a Mon Calamari, Flodon traveled to the planet Mon Calamari and participated in the Calamari Project, an Imperial operation that aimed to spark a war between the Mon Calamari and Quarren species.
